jdbc-user-service.users-by-username-query: SELECT login, senha, 'true' as enable FROM usuario WHERE login=?
jdbc-user-service.authorities-by-username-query: SELECT u.login, pg.nome FROM usuario u, permissao pg, grupo_permissoes_permissao gp, usuario_grupo_permissoes gu WHERE u.login = ? AND u.id = gu.usuario_id AND gu.gruposPermissoes_ID = gp.GRUPO_PERMISSOES_ID AND pg.id = gp.permissoes_ID AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM usuario_excessao_permissao up WHERE u.id = up.usuario_id AND pg.id = up.permissao_id AND gu.gruposPermissoes_ID = up.GRUPO_PERMISSOES_ID)
